Package gr.aueb.cf.ch13.exercises.bankapp

Class OverfraftAccount

java.lang.Object
gr.aueb.cf.ch13.exercises.AccountHW
gr.aueb.cf.ch13.exercises.bankapp.OverfraftAccount
public class OverfraftAccount extends AccountHW
Defines an OverfraftAccount class which extends AccountHW. This class allows overdraft withdrawals beyond account balance.

  • Method Details

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(double amount, String ssn) throws Exception
      Withdraws a certain amount of money from the OverfraftAccount. Allows overdrafts even if balance goes below zero.
      Overrides:
      withdraw in class AccountHW
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of money to be withdrawn.
      ssn - the SSN to validate withdrawal.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the withdrawal conditions are not met.
